description: After successfully completing a Vue bootcamp conducted by Monterail, I joined company as a junior front-end developer and quickly transitioned to a regular position within 6 months. During this time, I participated in diverse projects, including applications for an international non-profit, a live shopping platform, and a luxury fashion brand e-commerce. Each project involved collaboration within a global team, working closely with developers, testers, project managers, clients, and other stakeholders within an Agile development environment

I joined a dynamic 4-person team at Auroria working within an agile environment. Primely I was responsible for building front-end interfaces and back-end applications. I played a key role in developing a tool enabling users to compare ring offers from different producers. Leveraging this experience, I collaborated with the team to craft an e-commerce platform for customizable jewelry. Finally, I had the incredible opportunity to contribute to the development of Auroria's large-scale online store, including critical components like the warehouse management system.
